channel.title: Making Clickable Links For The Chatbox when someon logs in?
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering how i would make a clickable link in the chatbox when someone logs in. Im very curious, because i need to add rules. If someone could post, It would be greatly appreciated! THANKS!
